page.name: Session 1: Learning Objectives
page.content:
Terminal Objectives (TOs) and Enabling Objectives (EOs)

Session 1: Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act (WIOA) and Workforce Preparation

TO: Understand what constitutes the workforce preparation activities referenced in WIOA and explain how to integrate them into adult education programming and instruction.

EOs:

1-1: Explain the importance of workforce preparation activities in achieving the goals of WIOA.

1-2: Define workforce preparation activities.

1-3: Describe the evidence that illustrates how workforce preparation activities align with and reinforce effective teaching strategies for deeper learning.

1-4: Match sample lesson activities with the specific workforce preparation skills they illustrate.
